column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: 見つけた
column4: Oh, I found it.

column3: 見つからない
column4: I had no luck...

column3: ココ知ってる？
column4: Recognize anything?

column3: まだです…
column4: Not yet...

column3: はい おかげさまで！
column4: I did—thanks!

column3: 教えてください
column4: Please show me.

column3: いいえ
column4: No.

column3:
この山はラネール山だと思うんだがな…

ラネール山は この村からずっと東にある
大きな雪山だ
その麓にあるネルドーラ雪原の西の方に
その門があったはずだぞ
column4:
I think the mountain right here is 
Mount Lanayru...

Mount Lanayru is a big, snow-covered
peak that's far to the east of this village.

The gate that I mentioned should be to
the west of Naydra Snowfield, which is at
the foot of the mountain.

column3:
神秘のベールに包まれた大妖精の泉… 
一度はお目にかかりたいものだよ…
column4:
Someday I hope I can see that place
spoken of in whispers, veiled in
mystery...the Great Fairy Fountain...

column3:
そうかそうか
見つけたか…
な！"見つけた？！
ほ本当かね？！
で その場所の絵は？！
絵は持ってきてくれたかね？！
column4:
Ahhh! You...you found it?! Really?!


Are you serious right now?!


And if you are, then where's the picture?
You remembered to bring the picture,
right?

column3:
そうか…
やはり そう簡単にはいかんか
もし大妖精の泉を見つけたら
ぜひ絵を描いてきてくれ頼んだよ
column4:
Oh...I see. It's not easy to find at all, 
is it?

But if you do happen to find the
Great Fairy Fountain somehow, be sure
to get a picture of it, OK?

column3:
しかし… よく探してきてくれたな

何かお礼をしたいところだが…
あいにく持ち合わせもないし…
そうだ！

キミ行きたい場所や探したい場所はないかね？

私はハイラル中を旅してきたからな
気になる場所があるなら役に立てるかもしれんぞ
column4:
Well, I'm impressed you found it.


I want to give you something to show my
appreciation, but I don't think I have
anything on me...
I know!


Is there a place you've been seeking?
I've traveled all over Hyrule, so I might
be able to help you find it.

column3:
これは大きな門とその奥に雪山…
そうだ あそこだ！
この村からずっと東に行くと大きな雪山がある
ラネール山という山だ
そのラネール山のふもとにある
ネルドーラ雪原の西に その門があったはずだぞ
column4:
A large gate with a snowy mountain
beyond it... Oh, I know that place! There
is a big mountain east of this village...
It's called Mount Lanayru.


At the base of Mount Lanayru, on the
west side of Naydra Snowfield, lies
that gate. I'm almost certain!

column3:
私の知ってる場所でよかったよ
少しはお役に立てたかね？
column4:
I'm glad I knew about that location.
I suppose my help was useful, then?

column3:
どうした？
また あの絵の場所の事を知りたいのかね？
column4:
What's up? You want to know more
about that place in the picture?

column3:
神秘のベールに包まれた大妖精の泉… 

雨が降ろうが雷に打たれようが
私は絶対あきらめんよ！
column4:
That secret place veiled in mystery...
The Great Fairy Fountain...

Neither snow nor rain nor heat nor
lightning strike stays me from swift
completion of this self-appointed task!

column3:
なんだ いいのか？

こんな天気の中わざわざ話しかけるぐらいだから
何か急ぎの用かと思ったよ
column4:
You don't need my help? Really?


And here I figured you needed 
something urgently since you came
calling in this terrible weather.

column3:
それならよかった！

私はまた旅を続けていくつもりだ
どこかでまた会うかもしれんな
キミは絶景でつながったソウルメイトだ！
何か困ったことがあったら声をかけてくれ
column4:
That's great to hear!


I'm going to keep traveling, so it's
possible that we'll run into each other
again somewhere!
You and I are bound together by our
love of beautiful scenery. I can feel it!

And you shouldn't think twice to call on
me whenever you need some help!

column3:
またここで会うとはな

ところで…
あの絵の場所には たどり着けたかね？
column4:
I can't believe we ran into each other
here. Did you make it to the place in the
picture?

column3:
そうかそうか…

私はまた旅を続けていくつもりだ
どこかでまた会うかもしれんな
キミは絶景でつながったソウルメイトだ！
何か困ったことがあったら声をかけてくれ
column4:
I see—all in good time, then...


I'm going to keep traveling, so it's
possible that we'll run into each other
again somewhere!
You and I are bound together by our
love of beautiful scenery. I can feel it!

And you shouldn't think twice to call on
me whenever you need some help!

column3: うーん……
column4: Hrm...
